sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Card, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { CSVLink } from "react-csv"; import csvExample from '../images/csv-example.png'; class Instructions extends Component { state = {} render() { const exportData = [['Serial Number', 'Series', 'Denomination', 'Issue Date']] return (
PRICING BONDS BY SPREADSHEET
STEP 1 Download the CSV Template STEP 2
    Open up the CSV Template in Microsoft Excel or similar application.
  1. It should look something like this:
  2. For each of your bonds, insert a new row into the spreadsheet.
 STEP 3 Navigate to the BOND PRICING > SPREADSHEET page.
Import your CSV file using the ATTACHMENT field at the top of that page.
) } } export default Instructions;
